text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feeling so alive
Dancing in the streets
No need to hide

[Verse 2]
Thunder in the sky
But I’m not scared
Lightning in my eyes
The world is dared

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No more pain
Spinning round again
Laughing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Puddles at my feet
Splashing like a child
Everyone I meet
Smiling all the while

[Verse 4]
Clouds above so grey
Colors in my heart
In this rainy play
We’re a work of art

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No more pain
Spinning round again
Laughing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
